ThunderDex
рдирд╡реАрдирддрдо War Thunder рд╕рдорд╛рдЪрд╛рд░ рдирд╡реАрдирддрдо рдЕрдкрдбреЗрдЯ рд╡рд╛рд╣рдиреЛрдВ Favorite(d) Vehicles рд╕рдорд╛рдпреЛрдЬрди рд▓рдбрд╝рд╛рдИ рдХреА рд░реЗрдЯрд┐рдВрдЧ: рдЖрд░реНрдХреЗрдб рд╡рд╛рд╕реНрддрд╡рд┐рдХ рд╕рд┐рдореНрдпреБрд▓реЗрдЯрд░ рдЙрдкрд▓рдмреНрдз рдирд╣реАрдВ рд╣реИ рдЕрдиреБрд╕рдВрдзрд╛рди: рдЦрд░реАрджрдирд╛: рдмрдВрдбрд▓ рдпрд╛ рдЙрдкрд╣рд╛рд░ рд╡рд┐рд╡рд░рдг: рд╕рд╛рдорд╛рдиреНрдп рдЬрд╛рдирдХрд╛рд░реА: рдкрдХреНрд╖ - рд╡рд┐рдкрдХреНрд╖: рдкрдХреНрд╖: рд╡рд┐рдкрдХреНрд╖: рдЦрд╛рд▓реА рд╕реВрдЪреА рд▓реЛрдб рд╣реЛ рд░рд╣рд╛ рд╣реИтАж рдХреГрдкрдпрд╛ рдкреНрд░рддреАрдХреНрд╖рд╛ рдХрд░реЗрдВтАж рд╕рд░реНрд╡рд░ рд╕реЗ рдХрдиреЗрдХреНрдЯ рдирд╣реАрдВ рдХрд░ рд╕рдХрд╛m рддреНрд░реБрдЯрд┐: рдХреБрдЫ рдЧрд▓рдд рд╣реЛ рдЧрдпрд╛ рдмрд╛рд░реЗ рдореЗрдВ рдореБрдЦрдкреГрд╖реНрда рд╣рд╡рд╛рдИ рдЬрд╣рд╛рдЬ рд╣реЗрд▓реАрдХрд╛рдкреНрдЯрд░ рдЯреИрдВрдХ рдЬрд╣рд╛рдЬреЛрдВ рдкрд╕рдВрджреАрджрд╛ рдирд╛рдкрд╕рдВрдж рдХрд░реЗрдВ тЭдя╕П тАв рджрд╛рди тАв тЭдя╕П рдЧрддрд┐рд╢реАрд▓ рдереАрдорд┐рдВрдЧ рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рдбрд╛рдпрдирд╛рдорд┐рдХ рдереАрдорд┐рдВрдЧ рд╕рдХреНрд╖рдо рдХрд░реЗрдВ %s тЭдя╕П рджрд╛рди рджреЗрдХрд░ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдХрд╛рдо рдХрд╛ рд╕рдорд░реНрдерди рдХрд░реЗрдВ!! рдореИрдВ War Thunder Wiki рдХрд╛ рд▓рдЧрд╛рддрд╛рд░ рдЙрдкрдпреЛрдЧрдХрд░реНрддрд╛ рдерд╛ рдФрд░ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдмреНрд░рд╛рдЙрдЬрд╝рд░ рдкрд░ рдЗрд╕рдХрд╛ рдЙрдкрдпреЛрдЧ рдХрд░рддреЗ-рдХрд░рддреЗ рдердХ рдЧрдпрд╛ рдерд╛.

Hello!!

Thank you for using ThunderDex тЭд

The BEST and ONLY War Thunder Wikipedia client for Android.

Please, consider donating if you are enjoying the app... a LOT of work goes into this free app.

You can donate by going into the settings of the app and clicking on the PayPal, or the Cash App option!

Changelog History 3.5.6:
тАв Included original German Translation credits
тАв Updated Hungarian translations
тАв Fixed "upcoming features" animated background not being full screen
тАв Misc. small fixes
тАв Updated Gradle and Libraries

3.5.5:
тАв Slightly reduced app size again by a couple hundred kilobytes
тАв When you download a vehicle image, it now outputs a file with the vehicles name instead of random numbers
тАв Fixed splash screen icon
тАв Reintroduce "Upcoming Features" in the "About" section of the app
тАв Included all app changelogs from 2.0.0 to the newest version, if you want to look back on updates (scroll down for updates)
тАв Fixed splashscreen
тАв Add German translation credits

3.5.1:
тАв Misc. small changes

3.3.1:
тАв Added Predictive Back Animations in the app
тАв Redesigned the "Preview App Features" Preference
тАв Added the ability to navigate back in the "preview upcoming app features" Preference
тАв Updated the stars animation time in the "preview app features" preference
тАв Updated Hungarian translations (Thanks tdikristof_ on Discord)

3.3.0 (big update):
тАв Fix some text getting cut off on devices with smaller screens
тАв Added a small divider in the Settings
тАв Increased ThunderDex Header text size
тАв Added a new setting that shows ThunderDex plans for 2024 :)
тАв UI adjustments
тАв Removed some of the summary text in the settings
тАв Removed "Google Pay" donation option
тАв Slightly redesigned the Settings
тАв Text updates and changes
тАв Updated Android Build Tools to 35.0.0rc3
тАв Changed some height sizes of elements in the app
тАв Fix text wrap issue on certain devices for the upcoming features preference

3.2.4:
тАв Adjust vehicle image height 
тАв Updated Android AGP
тАв Library updates

3.2.3:
тАв Added Android 9 support
тАв Change text in a Dialog

3.2.2:
тАв Adjusted vehicle image height... no more scrolling in the "wiki" tab.. :)
тАв Fix changelog typo from 3.2.1
тАв Bug fixes

3.2.1:
тАв Fixed Google Pay not launching on older devices
тАв Added an option to copy the Google Pay Email in the dialog

3.2.0:
тАв Added cash app donation option
тАв Added google pay donation option
тАв Fixed up some code with the code analyzer
тАв Changed the "Latest Updates" tab to "Latest Game Updates"
тАв Lots of small text adjustments that you may or may not notice
тАв Fixed all Java issues in the app
тАв Further tweaks to elements in the app such as header height and image height

3.1.3:
тАв Fix changelog not being up to date

3.1.2:
тАв Updated AGP
тАв Bug fixes
тАв Performance improvements
тАв Changed some element sizes in the app
тАв Updated a library
тАв Updated Build Tools
тАв Updated Gradle

3.1.1:
тАв Added Lithuanian and Hungarian translations (thanks to theslimyboi and Tdikristof_ on Discord for the translations)
тАв Further reduced app size ;)
тАв Made "ThunderDex" Header text slightly smaller
тАв Removed some unused resources
тАв Expanded the height of the ThunderDex Header box
тАв Expanded the height of Vehicle Images
тАв Updated some of the internal structuring of the apps gradle file 

3.1.0:
тАв *** Decreased app size by ~4MB ***
тАв Small text changes
тАв Adjusted some UI elements
тАв Cleaned up code
тАв Removed unused resources
тАв Cleaned up some backend code for the app

3.0.1:
тАв Fix changelog typo
тАв Small string adjustments
тАв Removed unused drawables

3.0.0:
тАв BRAND NEW DESIGN!
тАв Cleaned up the user interface
тАв Added my ThunderDexApp subreddit
тАв planes / jets has been changed to Aircraft
тАв Add blurred searchview
тАв Fix toolbar glitching while collapsiing
тАв Remove special star character from vehicle info
тАв Removed translations setting
тАв Removed request a feature activity 

2.5.2:
тАв Permanent discord link added! Please join the discord group (settings > discord)
тАв Made image gradient slightly darker
тАв Fixed the bug where the toolbar would include the gradient 

2.5.1:
тАв Update the discord invite link

2.5.0:
тАв Added the "usage in battles" section for vehicles
тАв Vehicle images are now larger! :)
тАв Vehicle image gradient fixed and adjusted тАв Slight UI adjustments
тАв Removed translations again for now
тАв cleaned up code via suggestions from the android studio code analyzer
тАв Updated Gradle and AGP
тАв Reduce app size (it;s now under 10mb)

2.0.0:
тАв VEHICLE SEARCH ADDED
тАв Further reduce app size
тАв Prevent Dialog from being closed when touched outside :)
тАв Added a nice gradient for the vehicle images
